programme.title: Heavy Rescue: 401
programme.desc: Gary's crew and family come together for a multi-wreck scene at the border. A delicate recovery in Toronto is complicated by low power lines and a bad fuel leak. A garbage hauler makes a heavy mess for the Ross Crew.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: As fall approaches, the Kilchers kick into high gear. A large bull moose stalks the homestead and Eivin must keep his family safe. Atz Sr. hunts bear and nearly loses a horse. Otto begins the massive cleanup from an explosive wildfire prevention project.

programme.title: Moonshiners
programme.desc: Mark and Digger attempt oatmeal raisin shine for a high-flying Nashville customer. Mike and Jerry find themselves under the gun when they overdeliver on proof to a biker gang. Mark and Huck forge a lifeline to old-time shiners deep in the mountains.

programme.title: CSI: NY

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: When the body of a man is discovered buried among a pile of detached doll parts, Mac, Lindsay, Det. Maka and Danny are called to one of their most bizarre crime scenes yet. The team must piece together the clues and doll parts to uncover the murderer.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: Re-examine five pivotal aviation disasters to see how they shaped the air traffic control system we have today. Then, look into the future to assess an all-new, digital air traffic control system meant to replace today's aging systems.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: The investigation of the crash of a Russian commercial flight leads to a call to overhaul the country's aviation system.

programme.title: Mayday

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell

programme.title: North Woods Law

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens investigate an illegal deer hunting case that becomes the largest deer poaching case in Texas history.

programme.desc: When a game between two of New York's rival roller-derby teams ends in the murder of the premier skater in the league, the CSIs must discover if her murder was an act of jealousy from one of her teammates or if she was killed by an opposing skater.

programme.title: Forensic Files
